import React from 'react'; const Form = props => { return(
{ props.error.name ? {props.error.name.message} : "" }
{ props.error.type ? {props.error.type.message} : "" }
{ props.error.description ? {props.error.description.message} : "" }

Skills (Optional)

) } export default Form;
